scripts.setup: node -e "const fs = require('fs'); if (!fs.existsSync('.env')) fs.copyFileSync('.env.example', '.env'); if (!fs.existsSync('config.yaml')) fs.copyFileSync('config.yaml.example', 'config.yaml');" && echo 'Setup complete: .env and config.yaml have been created'
scripts.update: git pull && npm install && pm2 restart ASF_Prometheus_Exporter
